item.title: Using Spoons in Hammerspoon
item.description: In this second article about Hammerspoon, we look into Spoons, modules written in Lua which can be easily installed and loaded into Hammerspoon to provide ready-to-use functionality. Spoons provide a predefined API to configure and use them. They are also a good way to share your own work with other users. See also the first article in this series. Using a Spoon to locate your mouse As a first example, we will use the MouseCircle spoon, which allows us to set up a hotkey that displays a color circle around the current location of the mouse pointer for a few seconds, to help you locate it.
